mutants.code:
import string
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text):
    text = text.lower()
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    words = text.split()
    return dict(Counter(words))

import string
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text):
    text = text.lower()
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))
    words = text.split()
    return dict(Counter(words))
